text: Bractechlamys is a genus of molluscs in the family Pectinidae.Abbott, R.T. & Morris, P.A. A Field Guide to Shells: Atlantic and Gulf Coasts and the West Indies. New York: Houghton Mifflin, 1995. 29. ==Selected species== * Bractechlamys antillarum (Recluz, 1853) -- Antillean scallop ==References== Category:Pectinidae Category:Bivalve genera
title: Bractechlamys
